description:
Nivi Rhombodazzle is the only gnomish racial deity, though she is mostly revered among svirfneblin in the Darklands and is barely known on Golarion's surface.

She appears as a deep gnome with eyes that glimmer like gems. Her holy symbol is a gem cut into the shape of a six-sided die with seven pips on one side.
name: Nivi Rhombodazzle
